name: lie-pretransform
description: lie, with Browserify transforms already applied

scripts.prepublish: npm run build-node && npm run build-browser
scripts.build-browser: browserify-transform-cli inline-process-browser < node_modules/lie/lib/index.js | browserify-transform-cli unreachable-branch-transform | browserify-transform-cli es3ify > browser.js

author: Nolan Lawson <nolan@nolanlawson.com>
